alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 20 at 9:58AM CDT until March 21 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM CDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Choctaw, Washington, Clarke, Wilcox, Monroe, Conecuh, Butler and Crenshaw Counties. In Mississippi, Wayne County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
